videos.description: Clint Capela comes up with a steal and tosses a long pass to John Collins for a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Collins dunks it down for Hawks) 2021/1/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Collins dunks it down for Hawks

videos.description: Mason Plumlee dunks the ball down for the Pistons a couple of times vs. the Hawks in the quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Plumlee gets a pair of 3rd-quarter dunks for Pistons) 2021/1/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Plumlee gets a pair of 3rd-quarter dunks for Pistons

videos.description: Blake Griffin drives in and makes an incredible reverse and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Blake Griffin sinks an amazing shot you have to see to believe) 2021/1/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blake Griffin sinks an amazing shot you have to see to believe

videos.description: Jerami Grant tries to score the game-winning shot for the Pistons, but John Collins is able to prevent it from happening, sending the game to overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Collins blocks Grant’s shot to force OT) 2021/1/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Collins blocks Grant's shot to force OT
